newsitem.title: UK: Kingfisher firms, Morgan Stanley upbeat.
newsitem.headline: Kingfisher firms, Morgan Stanley upbeat.

text.p: Shares in UK retail group Kingfisher Plc pushed higher on Tuesday, bolstered by an upbeat study from Morgan Stanley, dealers said.
Kingfisher was up 6-1/2p or just over one percent at 640p at midday while the overall market was up 0.67 percent.
Victoria Melendez, UK retail analyst at Morgan Stanley said the brokerage had recently initiated cover of Kingfisher with an "outperform" rating.
"We have a 12-month price target of 773p for the stock...and we feel the company's continued recovery in profits is likely to underpin the future share price performance," Melendez said.
